title: Why is token based authentication better for Single Page Applications?
body: Okay so this might be a very rookie-ish or naive question but I tried searching the internet and have resorted to stack overflow only after not finding anything fruitful. I have been reading about Token based authentication as well as Cookie based authentication. I have come across the opinion that token based authentication is better for Single page web applications but cannot clearly understand why. I will be using nodejs and angularjs to accomplish the same.
